dataObject.content: The "OK" hand gesture is among the 36 new entries added Thursday to a database of hate symbols used by white supremacists and other far-right extremists.

annotationData.content: {"category":{"label":"Biased"},"rationale":"Thursday to a database of hate symbols used by white supremacists and other far-right extremists."}

{"category":{"label":"Biased"},"rationale":"It's biased because it cites a political side, in this case the far-right extremists and white supremacists, this can influence the opinion of readers to believe that only these people use this gesture qualified as a \"symbol of hate\""}
